name: Socky day
description: What can be worse than losing a second sock? Losing ALL your socks! This is the story of a guy who lost his precious collection of socks. He is having a nightmare in which he has to find them. Your quest is to help him! To make things worse, the socks got hidden inside several items in the dark attic. But not only them - a monster, the sock thief, is also there! Search and collect as many socks as possible during the given time, but be cautious! Facing the monster will cause losing all the collected socks!
